## Curve3.CreateHermiteSpline() method

Returns a Curve3 object along a Hermite Spline curve : http://doc.babylonjs.com/tutorials/How\_to\_use\_Curve3\#hermite-spline

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static CreateHermiteSpline(p1: Vector3, t1: Vector3, p2: Vector3, t2: Vector3, nbPoints: number): Curve3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p1 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the origin point of the Hermite Spline |
|  t1 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the tangent vector at the origin point |
|  p2 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the end point of the Hermite Spline |
|  t2 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the tangent vector at the end point |
|  nbPoints | <code>number</code> | (integer) the wanted number of points in the curve |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Curve3`

the created Curve3
